snippet.title: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your first look at Robot Entertainment's just-announced Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap, the latest in the 10-million-unit-selling tower defense series. It promises four-player co-op, roguelite progression, crazier physics-based and destructive traps in bigger environments, and improved third-person combat – all rendered in Unreal Engine 5. It's in development for PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store) and Xbox Series X|S and due out in early 2025.

Music: "Art History"
Writer/Artist: Chad Jewett and Chelsey Hahn of Perennial
